thread.title: Mark Ed

author: Mark Ed
title: Mark Ed
text: Richard who came to change the tyre knew why the puncture had occurred even without me telling him, and showed me exactly how he knew. He recorded this fact on the job worksheet should I decide to make a claim. He was very knowledgeable, very friendly and efficient. I also compared the price against Kwik fit and TyresontheDrive were only Â£2 more expensive. Given the convenience of a repair at home and the fact that they turned up right at the start of the 2 hour time slot they gave me, it was such a small additional price to pay and well worth it. I have used this company twice now (after a personal recommendation) and would definitely recommend to others
